CustomField.defaultValue: IF(ISPICKVAL($User.Region__c, "North America"),"North America", IF(ISPICKVAL($User.Region__c, "META"),"META", IF(ISPICKVAL($User.Region__c, "LATAM"),"LATAM", IF(ISPICKVAL($User.Region__c, "Europe"),"Europe", IF(ISPICKVAL($User.Region__c, "APAC"),"APAC","")))))
CustomField.label: Region
